contact.html.title: Contact Us - Tiger BioSciences™
contact.html.meta_description: Get in touch with Tiger BioSciences. Call 1-888-665-5005 or contact us for product information, clinical support, and partnership opportunities.
contact.html.hero_subtitle: We're here to help. Whether you need product information, clinical support, or partnership opportunities, our team is ready to assist.

products.html.title: Products - Tiger BioSciences™
products.html.meta_description: Explore Tiger BioSciences' comprehensive portfolio of CAMPs, tissue products, and medical devices for wound care, aesthetics, and surgical applications.
products.html.hero_subtitle: From advanced wound care to aesthetic solutions, our vertically integrated approach ensures the highest quality products for healthcare professionals worldwide.

science.html.title: Our Science - Tiger BioSciences™
science.html.meta_description: Discover the science behind Tiger BioSciences' CAMPs technology, research pipeline, clinical trials, and innovations in regenerative medicine.
science.html.hero_subtitle: Our research teams combine decades of tissue science expertise with cutting-edge biotechnology to develop next-generation regenerative medicine solutions.

wound-care.html.title: Wound Care Solutions - Tiger BioSciences™
wound-care.html.meta_description: Advanced wound care solutions using CAMPs technology for chronic wounds, diabetic ulcers, and complex wound management.
wound-care.html.hero_subtitle: Clinically proven CAMPs technology for faster healing and better patient outcomes in chronic and complex wound management.

tissue-reconstruction.html.title: Tissue Reconstruction - Tiger BioSciences™
tissue-reconstruction.html.meta_description: Tissue reconstruction solutions for soft tissue repair, surgical reconstruction, and regenerative applications.
tissue-reconstruction.html.hero_subtitle: Comprehensive tissue matrices and scaffolds for complex reconstructive procedures and soft tissue repair.

aesthetic-medicine.html.title: Aesthetic Medicine - Tiger BioSciences™
aesthetic-medicine.html.meta_description: Aesthetic medicine solutions including dermal fillers, cellulite treatment, and regenerative aesthetics from Tiger BioSciences.
aesthetic-medicine.html.hero_subtitle: Advanced aesthetic solutions combining regenerative science with cosmetic excellence for natural, lasting results.

regenerative-medicine.html.title: Regenerative Medicine - Tiger BioSciences™
regenerative-medicine.html.meta_description: Regenerative medicine solutions leveraging tissue engineering and CAMPs technology for healing and restoration.
regenerative-medicine.html.hero_subtitle: Harnessing the body's natural healing capabilities through advanced tissue engineering and biomaterial science.

orthopedic.html.title: Orthopedic Applications - Tiger BioSciences™
orthopedic.html.meta_description: Orthopedic tissue products for bone and joint repair, sports medicine, and musculoskeletal applications.
orthopedic.html.hero_subtitle: Specialized tissue products for orthopedic surgery, sports medicine, and musculoskeletal healing.

research-pipeline.html.title: Research Pipeline - Tiger BioSciences™
research-pipeline.html.meta_description: Explore Tiger BioSciences' research pipeline including ongoing studies, future innovations, and breakthrough technologies in development.
research-pipeline.html.hero_subtitle: Our robust R&D pipeline features multiple projects advancing the next generation of tissue technology and regenerative medicine solutions.

clinical-trials.html.title: Clinical Trials - Tiger BioSciences™
clinical-trials.html.meta_description: Information about Tiger BioSciences clinical trials, study participation, and evidence-based research demonstrating product efficacy.
clinical-trials.html.hero_subtitle: Rigorous clinical research demonstrating safety, efficacy, and superior outcomes across our product portfolio.

publications.html.title: Scientific Publications - Tiger BioSciences™
publications.html.meta_description: Access peer-reviewed publications, clinical data, and research papers about Tiger BioSciences products and CAMPs technology.
publications.html.hero_subtitle: Peer-reviewed publications and clinical evidence supporting the efficacy of our products and technologies.

camps-technology.html.title: CAMPs Technology - Tiger BioSciences™
camps-technology.html.meta_description: Learn about proprietary CAMPs (Cellular, Acellular, and Matrix-like Products) technology revolutionizing tissue engineering.
camps-technology.html.hero_subtitle: Our proprietary CAMPs technology represents a breakthrough in tissue engineering, combining cellular components with advanced matrix structures for superior healing.

patents.html.title: Patents & Intellectual Property - Tiger BioSciences™
patents.html.meta_description: Tiger BioSciences' patent portfolio protecting innovative tissue technology, processing methods, and medical devices.
patents.html.hero_subtitle: Extensive patent portfolio covering our proprietary technologies, processing methods, and product innovations.

quality-assurance.html.title: Quality Assurance - Tiger BioSciences™
quality-assurance.html.meta_description: Tiger BioSciences quality assurance processes, AATB accreditation, and commitment to the highest standards.
quality-assurance.html.hero_subtitle: Every product undergoes rigorous quality testing and verification to ensure safety, efficacy, and reliability.

regulatory.html.title: Regulatory Compliance - Tiger BioSciences™
regulatory.html.meta_description: FDA compliance, AATB accreditation, and regulatory excellence at Tiger BioSciences tissue processing facilities.
regulatory.html.hero_subtitle: Full compliance with FDA regulations, AATB standards, and international quality requirements.

training.html.title: Training Programs - Tiger BioSciences™
training.html.meta_description: Comprehensive training programs for healthcare professionals on Tiger BioSciences products and applications.
training.html.hero_subtitle: Comprehensive training programs ensuring proper product handling, application, and optimal patient outcomes.

faq.html.title: FAQ - Tiger BioSciences™
faq.html.meta_description: Frequently asked questions about Tiger BioSciences products, ordering, reimbursement, and clinical applications.
faq.html.hero_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, processes, and services.

healpack.html.title: HealPack™ - Tiger BioSciences™
healpack.html.meta_description: HealPack advanced wound dressings using CAMPs technology for chronic wound management and accelerated healing.
healpack.html.hero_subtitle: Bioengineered wound dressings providing optimal healing environment for chronic and acute wounds.

caregraft.html.title: CarGraft™ - Tiger BioSciences™
caregraft.html.meta_description: CarGraft full-thickness human skin substitute for complex wound reconstruction and surgical applications.
caregraft.html.hero_subtitle: Advanced human skin allograft for complex wound reconstruction, burns, and surgical defects.

alloply.html.title: AlloPly™ - Tiger BioSciences™
alloply.html.meta_description: AlloPly dual-layer placental tissue matrix for wound care and soft tissue reconstruction applications.
alloply.html.hero_subtitle: Innovative placental tissue allograft combining two layers for enhanced wound healing and tissue repair.

acapatch.html.title: AcaPatch™ - Tiger BioSciences™
acapatch.html.meta_description: AcaPatch acellular collagen matrix for wound coverage and soft tissue support in surgical procedures.
acapatch.html.hero_subtitle: Acellular collagen matrix providing structural support for wound coverage and tissue regeneration.

bellafill.html.title: Bellafill® - Tiger BioSciences™
bellafill.html.meta_description: Bellafill FDA-approved dermal filler for wrinkles and acne scars with lasting, natural results.
bellafill.html.hero_subtitle: The only FDA-approved filler proven to last up to 5 years for wrinkles and acne scars.

aveli.html.title: Avéli™ - Tiger BioSciences™
aveli.html.meta_description: Avéli cellulite treatment device providing immediate, lasting results through innovative fibrous septae release technology.
aveli.html.hero_subtitle: Revolutionary single-treatment cellulite reduction with clinically proven, lasting results.

breast.html.title: Breast Solutions - Tiger BioSciences™
breast.html.meta_description: Comprehensive breast reconstruction and augmentation products including implants and tissue matrices.
breast.html.hero_subtitle: Advanced breast implants, tissue expanders, and reconstructive solutions for cosmetic and reconstructive surgery.

careers.html.title: Careers - Tiger BioSciences™
careers.html.meta_description: Join Tiger BioSciences and help revolutionize regenerative medicine. Explore career opportunities across our global organization.
careers.html.hero_subtitle: Be part of a team revolutionizing healthcare through innovation, science, and unwavering commitment to quality.
